attributes.action: provide accomodation and pay travel and living expenses for the entire population of Dundee to live in Dubai for a year in order to understand why we are twinned with them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As far as most inhabitants of Dundee are aware, we do not hold much similarities with the city of Dubai. 
We would like the opportunity to experience our cultural parallels by living in said city amongst our contemporaries in order to understand if they like onion pehs as much as we do.
We would also use this year long research trip to locate similar entertainment facilities such as the notorious Deja Vu and 24 hour bakery.
The reconnaissance mission would be very helpful to the development of both us as Dundonians and indeed the wider world.
As Dundonians we are rarely exposed to direct sunlight and therefore would expect you the Prime Minister to provide relatie sun blocking materials.
We will do you proud, Mr Brown, letting the Dubai-ins aware of our culture. We've heard that you're not allowed to drink much there, but we expect that a scotsman such as yourself will apply the relvant pressures to repeal this law before our arrival on Saudi soil.
It'll be a braw wee holiday!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
